fast_food_items.name: Lablabi
fast_food_items.description: A hearty and spicy chickpea soup, typically served with bread.

fast_food_items.name: Kafteji
fast_food_items.description: A mixed vegetable dish fried and served with eggs and spices.

fast_food_items.name: Tunisian Sandwich
fast_food_items.description: A baguette filled with tuna, eggs, and harissa for a spicy kick.

fast_food_items.name: Brik
fast_food_items.description: A crispy pastry filled with egg, tuna, and parsley, deep-fried to perfection.

fast_food_items.name: Mloukhia Sandwich
fast_food_items.description: A sandwich filled with a rich and flavorful beef stew made with Mloukhia powder.

fast_food_items.name: Fricassee
fast_food_items.description: A small fried sandwich filled with tuna, eggs, and olives.

fast_food_items.name: Chapati
fast_food_items.description: A flatbread sandwich filled with eggs, cheese, and harissa.

fast_food_items.name: Makloub
fast_food_items.description: A large folded sandwich made with flatbread, meat, and vegetables.

fast_food_items.name: Bambalouni
fast_food_items.description: A sweet Tunisian donut, fried and sprinkled with sugar.

fast_food_items.name: Slata Mechouia
fast_food_items.description: A grilled salad made with peppers, tomatoes, and onions, served with bread.
